title: Shadow Warrior 2: Deluxe Edition, v1.1.14.0 + 9 DLCs + Bonus Content
body:
Shadow Warrior 2: Deluxe Edition, v1.1.14.0 + 9 DLCs + Bonus Content


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: Flying Wild Hog / Devolver Digital
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 13.7 GB
Repack Size: from 7.9 GB [Selective Download]

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]

Converter to Steam build + CODEX crack

If, for whatever reason you need MP-only char skins + lowres artbook, available in game menu, download and unpack this GOG-to-Steam converter, which will make those “miracles” happen after unzipping. Thanks to Christsnatcher for pointing it out and preparing the packacge!

  • https://pastefg.hermietkreeft.site
  • https://pixeldrain.com/u/KAGiSNtM sw2_codex_crack.zip
  • https://www65.zippyshare.com/v/pPy50Crt/file.html

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on GOG v1.1.14.0 release with all DLCs and bonus content: 13.7 GB
  • 9 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (only when installed with all videos)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Non-game videos made an optional download, so you could save some traffic
  • Bonus content (ArtBook + OST in MP3) is also made optional
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 13.7 to 7.9~9.9 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes from 6 minutes (16-threads CPU) up to 15 minutes (4-threads CPU)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 13.8 GB (15 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Language can be changed in game settings

Game Description

Shadow Warrior 2 is the stunning evolution of Flying Wild Hog’s offbeat first-person shooter following the further misadventures of former corporate shogun Lo Wang. Now surviving as a reclusive mercenary on the edge of a corrupted world, the formidable warrior must again wield a devastating combination of guns, blades, magic and wit to strike down the demonic legions overwhelming the world. Battle alongside allies online in four-player co-op or go it alone in spectacular procedurally-generated landscapes to complete daring missions and collect powerful new weapons, armor, and arcane relics of legend.

Included DLCs

  • Alienware DLC
  • Bounty Hunt DLC Part 1
  • Bounty Hunt DLC Part 2
  • Deluxe Content
  • PAX West DLC
  • Pre-Order Pack
  • Quakecon DLC
  • Solid Gold Pack
  • The Way of the Wang

Optional videos

If you don’t want to download setup-fitgirl-optional-videos.bin (1.7 GB), you can still watch 3 of 4 videos on YouTube:

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIikukPw9f4
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uFsi6npD0Ro
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AsrvGM3u9z8

One missing-on-YouTube-video is a scenery/engine demonstration.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous SW2 repacks.
